holidays.title: National Fishing Day
holidays.description: Fishing is a recreational pastime, and if you’re lucky, you can bring home a fresh catch.

holidays.title: Clean Your Aquarium Day
holidays.description: Put on your rubber gloves and prepare to give a good scrubbing to your aquarium.

holidays.title: International Day for Countering Hate Speech
holidays.description: Let’s gather and fight against hate speech, which seeks to hurt and discriminate against people.

holidays.title: International Panic Day
holidays.description: Take a deep breath and start panicking because it’s International Panic Day!

holidays.title: International Picnic Day
holidays.description: Picnics are a great way to bring people together for an enjoyable day.

holidays.title: King's Mother's Birthday
holidays.description: Let the Queen Mother’s gentle heart inspire you to contribute to society’s wellness on her birthday.

holidays.title: Lock Check Day
holidays.description: It’s time to check those window and door locks.

holidays.title: Martyrdom Day of Sri Guru Arjun Dev Ji
holidays.description: Let’s honor Guru Arjun Dev Ji’s memory and remember his deeds, which bettered humanity.

holidays.title: National Black America’s Day of Repentance
holidays.description: Let’s reflect on our lives, pray for guidance, and contemplate ways to make our lives easier.

holidays.title: National Cherry Tart Day
holidays.description: Grab your dessert forks and get ready to satisfy your sweet tooth.

holidays.title: National Panic Day
holidays.description: Panic is common, but we can control how we react to it. Let’s learn more.

holidays.title: National Splurge Day
holidays.description: This day is here to show you how to spend your hard-earned bucks on something special...

holidays.title: National Wanna Get Away Day
holidays.description: Stand a chance to win 50 million Rapid Bonus Points this National Wanna Get Away Day.

holidays.title: Seychelles Constitution Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate this young nation’s day of national pride as it moves into a new future.

holidays.title: Sustainable Gastronomy Day
holidays.description: This Sustainable Gastronomy Day, let’s promote the use of clean energy by local restaurants!

holidays.title: Wear BLUE Day
holidays.description: Why wear blue today? To help decrease health issues found in most men across the globe.

holidays.title: Blake Shelton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This nine-time Grammy Award nominee holds the record for the most consecutive number one singles.

holidays.title: Josh Dun’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented drummer is one-half of one of the most successful alternative rock bands.

holidays.title: Paul McCartney’s Birthday
holidays.description: Even in old age, this talented rock singer and composer remains supreme.

holidays.title: Takeoff’s Birthday
holidays.description: Takeoff escaped the ghetto life to become one of the most celebrated modern rap artists.

holidays.title: Trippie Redd’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper emerged several years ago with a series of hits and is here to stay.
